lead_paragraph: A goal off Red Bulls midfielder Felipe’s face allowed his team to secure a point against Los Angeles.

headline.print_headline: Odd Goal Against Galaxy Leads to Draw, and Red Bulls Stay Unbeaten
headline.main: Odd Goal Against Galaxy Leads to Draw, and Red Bulls Stay Unbeaten

snippet: A goal off Red Bulls midfielder Felipe’s face allowed his team to secure a point against Los Angeles.
abstract: New York Red Bulls tie Los Angeles Galaxy, 1-1, to remain unbeaten.
